author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Former Indian opener Murali Vijay lauded MS Dhoni's unique leadership and instinctive decision-making, citing the 2007 T20 World Cup final over to Joginder Sharma as a prime example. Vijay highlighted Dhoni's powerful hitting and mental strength, emphasising his unparalleled range and out-of-the-box approach that led to India's victory. Dhoni will continue with CSK in the IPL until 2026.
title: Not Sachin or Kohli! 'We should be proud that he was born in our country'

author: GLOBAL SPORTS DESK
description: Mitch Marner, a dynamic right-winger, has joined the Vegas Golden Knights on a massive eight-year, $96 million deal.  Known for his speed and skill, Marner recently surpassed 100 points and boasts impressive career earnings.  His move to Vegas, following a decade with the Maple Leafs, solidifies his status as a league star with lucrative endorsements.
title: Mitch Marner’s 2025 net worth: Career earnings, endorsements and contract details

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: IndiGo is investigating the underlying issues behind recent flight delays and has determined that various factors are at play, excluding pilot shortages. While they're working towards stabilising their operations, they anticipate a return to full operational capacity by December 10.
title: Indigo cancellations: Airline to conduct 'root cause analysis' into disruptions

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Australia secured an eight-wicket victory in the second Ashes Test in Brisbane, taking a commanding 2-0 series lead. England's batting and bowling struggled on the Gabba surface, compounded by dropped catches. Iceland Cricket humorously withdrew Brendon McCullum from their coaching wishlist following the defeat.
title: 'McCullum, you're off our coaching': ENG coach receives message after Ashes loss

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Lando Norris clinched his maiden Formula 1 world championship at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, narrowly beating Max Verstappen by two points.  While Verstappen won the race, Norris's third-place finish secured the title.  Oscar Piastri completed a strong McLaren showing by finishing second in the race and third in the championship, marking a significant upset for Norris.
title: Norris becomes first British driver to clinch F1 c'ship after Hamilton

author: RAJEEV SINGH
description: India is actively pursuing a decolonisation agenda, moving beyond English's historical dominance. This initiative, championed by PM Modi, aims to revive indigenous knowledge systems and promote regional languages in education and governance. While fostering national pride, concerns remain about potential Hindi imposition over linguistic diversity, sparking a crucial national dialogue.
title: Undoing Macaulay? Inside India’s decolonisation push towards ‘Bharat’ - explained

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: England head coach Brendon McCullum believes his team "trained too much" ahead of their heavy Ashes Test defeat in Brisbane. He suggested excessive preparation may have contributed to the team's struggles to adapt to conditions. McCullum emphasized the need for players to be physically and mentally fresh for crucial decisions during matches.
title: 'Will have beer tonight': ENG coach blames 'too much training' for Ashes defeat

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Australia have taken a commanding 2-0 lead in the Ashes series as they defeated England by eight wickets in the Brisbane day-night Test on Sunday. Joe Root scored his first Test century in Australia, but Australia established a significant first-innings lead. England fought back but ultimately fell short. With this win, Australia remain at the top of the World Test Championship standings.
title: WTC 2025-27: Australia top table after 2-0 Ashes lead; where is India?

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: Delhi CM Rekha Gupta stated that tackling the city's pollution crisis will require 27 months, blaming previous governments for inaction. Her comments followed protests demanding urgent measures against an "air emergency.
title: '27-year backlog': CM Rekha Gupta blames past govts for Delhi pollution

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: England captain Ben Stokes admitted his team struggled to handle pressure in key moments during their second Test defeat to Australia, leading to a 2-0 series deficit. Despite dropped catches and a lack of required mindset, Stokes believes a 3-2 Ashes victory is still possible if the team addresses issues quickly.
title: 'Australia not for weak men': Stokes admits ENG failed in pressure

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh stated that India's armed forces showed restraint during Operation Sindoor but possess the capability for a stronger response if needed. He highlighted the operation's success, attributing it to excellent coordination between forces, administration, and border residents, underscoring the vital role of enhanced border connectivity in national security and economic growth.
title: 'Could have done much more': Rajnath praises armed forces' role in Op Sindoor

author: TRISHA MAHAJAN
description: President Donald Trump's "America First" tariff policy has led to record revenue collections, but economic data reveals Americans bear the brunt of the costs. Tariffs are increasingly passed on to consumers and businesses, raising prices and contradicting claims of foreign payment, if rules of economics are studies. This strategy creates a dilemma between political popularity and growing economic burdens on households.
title: Tariffs to put 'America first': Is Trump spelling doom for US? Economics explained

title: 150 years of Vande Mataram: Why BJP and Congress are fighting over its ‘missing stanzas’ — explained

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Australia secured an eight-wicket victory in the second Ashes Test, taking a 2-0 series lead. During Australia's chase, Steve Smith and Jofra Archer engaged in a verbal exchange after Archer bowled a series of aggressive deliveries. Smith responded with boundaries, including a six, to finish the match.
title: 'Bowl fast when nothing’s happening': Smith-Archer showdown lights up Ashes - Watch

author: TOI TECH DESK
description: Netflix is acquiring Warner Bros. in an $82.7 billion deal, bringing HBO Max and HBO under its umbrella.  While assuring subscribers "nothing is changing today," the streaming giant anticipates a 12-18 month closing period.  Despite Netflix's assurances of a pro-consumer move, politicians and industry groups have raised significant concerns about potential price hikes and job losses.
title: Netflix sends 'late night letter' to its 300 million subscribers; says: Nothing is…

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Indian cricketer Smriti Mandhana has officially confirmed her wedding to music composer Palash Muchhal is off, ending weeks of speculation. She requested privacy for both families, stating her focus is now on representing India.  Calling herself a “very private person,” she urged restraint and understanding from the public.
title: Smriti Mandhana & Palash Muchhal's wedding cancelled: Full timeline of events

author: TOI CITY DESK
description: A devastating fire at a popular Goa nightclub claimed at least 25 lives and injured six others late Saturday night. The blaze, which broke out during peak hours, trapped many victims, primarily staff, due to suffocation. Authorities cited non-compliance with fire safety norms and lack of valid permissions as contributing factors to the tragedy.
title: A Sholay song, music, dance: Goa nightclub in full party mode, then deadly fire kills 25

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Indian cricketer Smriti Mandhana and music composer Palash Muchhal have officially confirmed their wedding has been called off after weeks of speculation. Both shared statements on Instagram, citing personal difficulties and a desire for privacy. Mandhana emphasised her focus remains on representing India in cricket.
title: 'Have decided to move on': Palash Muchhal calls off wedding with Smriti Mandhana

author: TOI BUSINESS DESK
description: India is sending accident investigators to Washington to review data and present their analysis on the June Air India crash. The Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau will join the NTSB and Boeing representatives in a review meeting. This follows reports of tension between Indian and US authorities over the investigation's conduct.
title: Air India crash: Investigators to meet in US next week, Boeing & others to join

author: etimes.in
description: Bigg Boss 19's grand finale is tonight, with fans eagerly awaiting the winner. A Times of India poll revealed contrasting fan favourites: Gaurav Khanna dominated Instagram, while Tanya Mittal led on X. This divergence highlights varied audience connections. The ultimate victor, however, rests on official votes and the show's internal process.
title: Bigg Boss 19 poll winner: Who will win the Bigg Boss 19 trophy?

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: A devastating fire at the Birch by Romeo Lane nightclub in Arpora, Goa, claimed at least 25 lives, including tourists and staff, and injured six. The blaze, possibly ignited by a cylinder blast, spread rapidly through the temporary structure. Authorities have arrested club managers, with owners facing arrest warrants, as investigations into safety norms commence.
title: Dance floor turns deadly: 25 dead after cylinder blast, helpline numbers issued; what we know so far

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Former India batting coach Sanjay Bangar asserts that Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma deserve special treatment and their places in the ODI setup should never have been questioned. He believes their years of contribution and recent strong performances warrant a different evaluation standard, highlighting their impact on team morale and performance.
title: IND vs SA: 'Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma have retired... ': Ex-India batting coach opens up

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: Civil Aviation Minister Ram Mohan Naidu countered Rahul Gandhi's criticism of the IndiGo crisis, asserting the government champions aviation competition to welcome new airlines and expand fleets. He highlighted recent legislation to reduce aircraft leasing costs, emphasizing the issue's public, not political, nature. Gandhi had blamed the government's 'monopoly model' for passenger woes.
title: IndiGo turmoil: Centre slams Rahul Gandhi's 'monopoly model' remark

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: Bihar's Chief Minister, Nitish Kumar, has received a prestigious accolade from the World Book of Records, London, acknowledging his exemplary political service and dedication to democracy. This achievement marks his historic tenth oath-taking as Chief Minister, a milestone that underscores both his resilience in governance and the confidence bestowed upon him by the citizens of Bihar.
title: Nitish Kumar enters World Book of Records - here is why

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Speaking after the win, Kuldeep referred to Rohit Sharma as the captain before quickly correcting himself to name KL Rahul, who led the side in the absence of Shubman Gill. Kuldeep was one of the architects of India’s dominant win, returning figures of 4-41. India won the thtee-match series 2-1.
title: On Live TV! Kuldeep Yadav calls Rohit Sharma India captain — Watch

author: TOI WORLD DESK
description: China's first snowfall brought a magical winter scene, while a new 'snow vacation' policy offers students in northeastern and northwestern regions a break to boost winter tourism. This initiative includes free access to scenic spots and ski venues for students, encouraging families to travel and enjoy the season.
title: Watch: December blizzard in China goes viral for snow-globe streets and whirling powder

description: Indian cricket star Smriti Mandhana has confirmed the cancellation of her wedding with music composer Palash Muchhal, addressing weeks of speculation through an Instagram post and requesting privacy for both families as they navigate the situation.

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Head coach Gautam Gambhir defended his flexible batting order approach in white-ball cricket, calling it "overrated" except for openers. He highlighted Washington Sundar's adaptability and team-first attitude. Gambhir also acknowledged dew's significant impact on the ODI series but expects less influence in the upcoming T20Is.
title: 'Batting order is very overrated': Gautam Gambhir hints at chop-and-change policy

author: TOI BUSINESS DESK
description: India's Multiplex Association warns that Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery could harm the country's theatrical ecosystem. The shift threatens the supply of films crucial for cinema footfall, as Netflix prioritizes streaming over theatrical releases. While immediate impact may be limited, the merger raises concerns about content availability and theatrical windows.
title: Warner Bros-Netflix deal: Is the Tudum effect harmful for Indian cinema?

author: TOI TECH DESK
description: Phoebe Gates' artificial intelligence shopping startup, Phia, has raised $30 million in new funding. This investment values the company at $180 million. Bill Gates, Phoebe's father, has supported the venture with his time and experience. Phia aims to make online shopping smarter and more sustainable. The app offers price comparisons, discounts, and secondhand options.
title: Bill Gates' daughter gets $30M for AI app: Gates says won't invest; works helpdesk

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: A devastating fire at a North Goa nightclub has claimed 25 lives, including four tourists and 14 staff members. Six others were injured and are receiving medical attention. Initial investigations suggest the venue may have violated fire safety regulations. Authorities are conducting a thorough inquiry to determine the exact cause and ensure strict legal action against those responsible for this tragic incident.
title: Goa nightclub fire: Four tourists among 25 killed; were trapped along with staff in kitchen

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Providing weight to the senior contingent, Virat Kohli emerged Player of the Series in the ODIs against South Africa, scoring two centuries and a fifty — a swift return to the highs he consistently reached from 2015 onwards. Rohit Sharma added a couple of fifties, underlining his enduring touch and class.
title: 'I've said it many times... ': Gambhir's big comment on Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli - Watch

author: U SUDHAKAR REDDY
description: A devastating fire in Albany, USA, claimed the life of 24-year-old cybersecurity professional Sahaja Reddy Udumala from Hyderabad. The blaze engulfed a residential building, trapping Sahaja who had just returned from a night shift. Firefighters bravely rescued her and another severely injured individual. Investigations into the cause are ongoing.
title: New York house fire: Hyderabad cyber security professional dies in US

author: TOI CITY DESK
description: BJP MP Kangana Ranaut, TMC MP Mahua Moitra, and NCP (SP) MP Supriya Sule were captured dancing together at industrialist Naveen Jindal's daughter's wedding. The trio performed a popular Bollywood song, with videos of their unexpected collaboration going viral on social media. Ranaut had previously shared behind-the-scenes photos of dance practice with her political counterparts.
title: Watch: Kangana Ranaut, Mahua Moitra and Supriya Sule dance together at wedding

author: BARSHA DUTTA
description: Patrick Mahomes faces scrutiny amid the Kansas City Chiefs' uncertain playoff outlook. NBA star Kevin Durant and Mahomes' wife, Brittany, have publicly defended the quarterback, dismissing claims of a "down year" and questioning his legacy. With playoff hopes on the line, Week 14 presents a crucial opportunity for Mahomes to silence critics and reaffirm his all-time status.
title: Brittany Mahomes hits back as fans question Patrick Mahomes’ legacy this season

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: South Africa's coach Shukri Conrad regrets using the word "grovel," acknowledging it overshadowed their historic Test win over India. He clarified no malice was intended, aiming only to describe India's defensive approach. Conrad also expressed disappointment in missing a chance to win both Test and ODI series, highlighting learnings from Indian stars like Kohli and Sharma for his young squad.
title: IND vs SA: 'It's really a pity': Shukri Conrad accepts mistake after controversial 'grovel' comment

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: A devastating fire ripped through a North Goa nightclub, claiming at least 25 lives and injuring many more. The blaze, reportedly triggered by an explosion, occurred in an establishment operating without valid permissions. Fire safety norms were not followed, and access for emergency services was severely hampered, leading to a tragic loss of life.
title: 'Kitchen was dead end': Witnesses recall night of horror at jam-packed North Goa club

author: TOI LIFESTYLE DESK
description: More people are recognizing ADHD symptoms today. This surge in awareness stems from better understanding, social media visibility, and reduced stigma. While diagnoses have risen, experts suggest it reflects improved recognition rather than a true increase in cases. Professional evaluation remains crucial to distinguish ADHD from other conditions and ensure proper support.
title: Why so many people think they have ADHD today, and the real reasons behind the surge

author: TOI NEWS DESK
description: Prime Minister Modi expressed profound sorrow over the Arpora nightclub fire, announcing Rs 2 lakh ex-gratia for deceased families and Rs 50,000 for the injured from PMNRF. The devastating blaze, reportedly caused by a cylinder blast, claimed at least 25 lives and injured around 50. Goa's Chief Minister has ordered a thorough investigation into the tragedy.
title: 25 killed in Goa nightclub: PM Modi announces Rs 2 lakh ex-gratia for kin of deceased

author: TNN
description: A devastating fire at a nightclub in Goa claimed at least twenty-five lives, primarily staff members trapped in the basement. The incident, one of the worst fire disasters in the state, has prompted an inquiry and calls for safety audits of tourist establishments. Officials confirmed the venue was operating without proper permissions.
title: 'Blow to Goa’s reputation': Most victims trapped at ‘Birch by Romeo Lane’ basement

author: TOI CITY DESK
description: A devastating fire at Birch By Romeo Lane nightclub in Arpora, Goa, claimed at least 25 lives shortly after midnight on Sunday. Initial reports suggest a cylinder blast triggered the blaze, with most victims, including staff and some tourists, succumbing to suffocation in the smoke-filled basement. Authorities have launched a full investigation into safety norm violations.
title: ‘Safety norms not followed’: 25 dead, 50 injured in Goa’s Arpora nightclub fire

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Virat Kohli is back in top form, scoring 376 runs in his last four ODIs with two centuries and feeling liberated. After a Player of the Series award, he expressed his best rhythm in years, contributing to India's series win. Kohli, who holds the world record with 53 ODI centuries, rated his 135 in Ranchi as his best knock of the series.
title: Top finish! '12 sixes, 302 runs' - Virat Kohli says 'I feel really free in my mind'

author: TOI TECH DESK
description: Norway's $2 trillion Sovereign Wealth Fund opposed Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella's re-election as board chair and his compensation package. The fund's stance aligns with its policy against CEOs holding dual roles and concerns over excessive executive pay. Despite this, Microsoft shareholders overwhelmingly approved Nadella's $96.5 million compensation.
title: One of Microsoft's largest shareholder votes against CEO Satya Nadella

author: SEHJAL GUPTA
description: A missing Virginia football coach, Travis Turner, may never be found. He vanished from his home on November 20. Authorities charged him with child pornography offenses. A law enforcement expert states dense woods and wildlife make recovery difficult. Search teams are using advanced tools, but success remains uncertain. A reward is offered for information leading to his arrest.
title: Grim theory on missing coach Travis Turner as veteran cop warns chilling clues

author: TNN
description: Hundreds of passengers faced a chaotic ordeal at Kempegowda International Airport as IndiGo flights were cancelled, leading to prolonged waits for abandoned and often damaged baggage. Passengers described a system collapse with no clear communication or assistance, causing significant stress and loss.
title: Indigo fiasco: Airline chaos abates but baggage nightmare persists for passengers

author: SEHJAL GUPTA
description: Tim Pool reported shots fired at his West Virginia home on December 5, hours after a podcast episode featuring Milo Yiannopoulos made unverified claims about Erika and Charlie Kirk. Pool's security team is reviewing footage, and he suggested the incident was meant to intimidate. Authorities have not yet confirmed the shooting.
title: Tim Pool reports shooting at home amid storm over Erika Kirk divorce debate

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Yashasvi Jaiswal's maiden ODI century (116*) powered India to a commanding nine-wicket victory over South Africa, clinching the series 2-1. Rohit Sharma also shone with 75 runs, crossing 20,000 international runs. The duo's 155-run opening stand set the stage for a dominant chase, with Virat Kohli adding an unbeaten 65.
title: 'Mota ho jaunga wapis': Rohit Sharma refuses to eat cake after India win - Watch

author: TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK
description: Ranveer Singh's latest film, 'Dhurandhar,' is taking the box office by storm with an impressive Rs 58 crore net earned in just its first two days. Directed by Aditya Dhar, this gripping spy thriller has surged in popularity, powered by outstanding word-of-mouth and packed theatres on Saturday.
title: 'Dhurandhar' collection: Ranveer Singh's spy actioner crosses Rs 50 crore mark

author: TOI CITY DESK
description: A devastating fire at a North Goa nightclub, Birch by Romeo Lane, claimed at least 23 lives late Saturday night, primarily club employees. Officials suspect a cylinder blast triggered the blaze, with most victims succumbing to suffocation. The Chief Minister indicated potential non-compliance with fire safety norms, promising action against management and officials.

description: India clinched the ODI series 2-1 against South Africa with a dominant nine-wicket victory. Virat Kohli, back to his best, was the series' top scorer and expressed a newfound mental freedom.  The bowlers, particularly Prasidh Krishna and Kuldeep Yadav, were instrumental in restricting South Africa, showcasing improved wicket-taking ability.  The win boosts Indian morale ahead of the T20 series.
title: IND vs SA: Kohli roasts Arshdeep after ODI series win over South Africa - Watch

author: REBECCA SAMERVEL
description: A 56-year-old driver, jailed for eight years, has been acquitted of sexual assault charges. The Pocso court found the prosecution failed to prove the victim's age and intellectual capacity, citing major inconsistencies.  Defense argued false implication due to a prior dispute. The judge highlighted scanty evidence, granting the accused the benefit of doubt.
title: Mumbai: After 8 years in jail, man acquitted in Pocso case over ‘scanty evidence’

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Abhishek Sharma has etched his name in T20 history, becoming the first Indian to smash 100 sixes in a calendar year. His explosive 62 off 34 balls against Services in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy propelled him to this milestone. Sharma's remarkable year includes 1,499 runs at a staggering strike rate of over 200, showcasing his dominance.
title: Not Rohit or SKY: Abhishek Sharma achieves what no Indian ever has in T20

author: TOI SPORTS DESK
description: Head coach Gautam Gambhir has firmly rejected social media speculation about split coaching for Indian cricket. He expressed surprise at these theories, urging commentators to respect their boundaries. Gambhir highlighted that the recent Test series loss to South Africa was discussed without acknowledging the absence of the captain and main batter in the crucial first Test.
title: 'Played without captain': Gambhir hides behind 'excuses' for Test series defeat

author: SEHJAL GUPTA
description: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.
title: Anna Kournikova & Enrique Iglesias Net Worth 2025: Career, Earnings, Biz

author: TNN
description: An 11-year-old boy was allegedly sexually assaulted by four students, aged 12-15, inside a government school bathroom in Delhi's Rohini. The accused reportedly recorded a video of the assault and threatened the victim. Police apprehended the suspects, who have been sent to an Observation Home.
title: Delhi boy sexually assaulted at govt school bathroom; act recorded and circulated among peers

author: TNN
description: A Bengaluru Central Prison warder, Rahul Patil, was arrested for attempting to smuggle cigarettes and absorbent paper into the barracks. The banned items were discovered during a frisking at the prison entrance. This incident follows a recent ban on cigarette sales within the prison canteen.
title: Night shift bust: Bengaluru prison warder held for smuggling cigarettes in underwear

author: H M CHAITHANYA SWAMY
description: A Bengaluru gynaecologist was drugged and robbed by her domestic helpers who fled with gold and cash. The incident occurred after the couple, hired just a month prior, sedated the doctor and her son. CCTV footage confirmed the theft, prompting a police investigation into the family's hiring practices.
title: Bengaluru: Gynaecologist drugged, robbed by domestic helpers; Nepal couple on the run

author: TNN
description: The government has imposed a Rs 18,000 domestic airfare cap and ordered IndiGo to restore full operations within two days, citing exorbitant fares and mass cancellations.  Aviation authorities invoked powers to ensure fair pricing and mandated refunds, aiming to protect passengers from opportunistic charges amidst a significant operational disruption.
title: Flight chaos triggers fare cap: IndiGo gets 2-day fix window; rescheduling fees scrapped

author: TNN & Agencies
description: In a recent statement, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar highlighted that Sheikh Hasina's visit to India is a personal decision shaped by last year's developments. He underscored India's unwavering support for Bangladesh, reiterating the importance of democratic values. Jaishankar also defended India's sovereignty in foreign relations, stressing that no nation has the authority to dictate its alliances with others.
title: 'Stay self-decided': EAM on Hasina's extradition; future hinges on circumstances
